fileDescription: Strings for Tilt to arrow key.

rex_tilt2arrowkey.name: Tilt to arrow key
rex_tilt2arrowkey.description: Get arrow key event from tilt's beta and gamma input.

directions.name: Directions
directions.desc: The number of directions of movement available.

sensitivity.name: Sensitivity
sensitivity.desc: Sensitivity of tilt angle, in degree.

on-up-pressed.description: Triggered when Up arrow is pressed.

on-down-pressed.description: Triggered when Down arrow is pressed.

on-left-pressed.description: Triggered when Left arrow is pressed.

on-right-pressed.description: Triggered when Right arrow is pressed.

on-any-pressed.description: Triggered when any arrow is pressed.

is-up-down.description: Return true if Up arrow is currently held down.

is-down-down.description: Return true if Down arrow is currently held down.

is-left-down.description: Return true if Left arrow is currently held down.

is-right-down.description: Return true if Right arrow is currently held down.

on-up-released.description: Triggered when Up arrow is released.

on-down-released.description: Triggered when Down arrow is released.

on-left-released.description: Triggered when Left arrow is released.

on-right-released.description: Triggered when Right arrow is released.

calibration.display-text: Calibration zero angle of Up-Bottom to [b]{0}[/b], zero angle of Left-Right to [b]{1}[/b]

set-sensitivity.description: Set sensitivity angle of turning direction detection.

sensitivity-angle.description: Get sensitivity angle of turning direction detection.
